24000001.additional_information: In an extraordinary general meeting on December 14, 2023, the resignation of Mr. El Akili Idriss from his position as manager was accepted and Mr. El Akili Imad was appointed as administrator for an indefinite period starting from the same date. Additionally, share transfers involved Mrs. Pitul Simona, Mrs. MoustAOUDDI Salima, and Mr. El Akili Idriss transferring a total of 35 shares to Mrs. El Akili Majda. The resolutions were unanimously adopted.

24000002.additional_information: On 11/12/2023, during an extraordinary general meeting, it was decided that Mr. ZULFIQAR Ahmed Malik would become an administrator starting from 11/12/2023, while Mr. ASGHAR Muhammad would resign from his position as of the same date. Additionally, the company's headquarters will be relocated to Chaussée d’Enghien 294, 1480 Tubize.

24000003.additional_information: On 01/11/2023, during an extraordinary general meeting, it was decided that Mr. KHALID Muhammad will be appointed as an administrator and Mr. ASGHAR Muhammad will resign from his position as an administrator on the same date.

24000004.additional_information: On 01/09/2023, during the extraordinary general assembly, the shareholders of SRL BRUSSEL SHOP decided to transfer the registered office to Chaussée d'Ixelles 25, 1050 Ixelles. A new distribution of shares was determined: Mr. BALOCH Bakhtyar holds 99/100 shares, Mr. FAZAL Karim holds 1/100 shares, and Mr. HUSSANI Naqibullah holds no shares. Session ended after reading the minutes.

24000005.additional_information: On December 13, 2023, an extraordinary general meeting decided to change the registered office address of GRANDR SRL from 209 Boulevard Lambermont, 1030 Schaerbeek to 54 Avenue Louise, 1050 Ixelles. The decision was unanimously approved, and Tresor Madoda Tuyinama was the manager in charge.

24000006.additional_information: The extraordinary general assembly on November 7, 2023, confirmed the renewal of the mandates for directors François Hublot and Jean-Marie Lefevre, and the French simplified joint-stock company BIOCODEX represented by Nicolas Coudurier, starting January 1, 2023, for three years until the ordinary general assembly in 2026. The administration body also reappointed François Hublot as delegated administrator from January 1, 2023, for three years. The annual general assembly on May 9, 2023, renewed the mandate of the Auditor, CDP Petit & Co, represented by Benjamin Gorlier, for three years. The board granted a power of attorney to Bofidi Accountants or their representatives, including Lindsey Schamp, Wendy Defreyne, Sylvia Vanbeveren, Eva Thielemans, and Tine Talpe, to act legally in dealings with public authorities such as tax administration and social security.

document_purpose: Adoption of new statutes in accordance with the Code of companies and associations
24000007.additional_information: The Extraordinary General Meeting on December 15, 2023, decided to adopt and overhaul the statutes to comply with the Code of companies and associations. The company is a partnership with the name THERMO SANITAR, located in the Brussels Capital region.

document_purpose: Nomination, Resignation, and Transfer of Shares
24000008.additional_information: On December 15, 2023, at 4 PM, an extraordinary general meeting of LOLA & BILLY company administrators was held at Avenue Wielmans Ceupens 173-175 Bto, 1190 Bruxelles. Present were Madame Jalil Najet, Monsieur Jalil Kalid, and Monsieur El Marnissi M'Hamed Bilal. Monsieur Jalil Kalid transferred 5 shares to El Marnissi M'Hamed Bilal, resulting in Madame Jalil Najet holding 95 shares and Monsieur El Marnissi M'Hamed Bilal holding 5 shares, totaling 100% of the shares. Furthermore, Monsieur Jalil Kalid resigned as administrator effective December 31, 2023, with Monsieur El Marnissi M'Hamed Bilal assuming the role from January 1, 2024. The meeting concluded at 4:30 PM.

document_purpose: Renewal of the Board of Directors
24000009.additional_information: On October 2, 2023, at 19:00, an extraordinary general meeting was held at the company's headquarters to appoint three new administrators: Mr. Jean Simons, Mrs. Brigitte Schrurs, and Mrs. Madeleine Simons. The mandates will last for 3 years starting from this date and are unpaid. The meeting concluded at 19:30.

document_purpose: Renewal of the Board of Directors
24000010.additional_information: The extraordinary general meeting held on October 2, 2023, at 3 PM at the company's headquarters unanimously decided to appoint Mr. Jean Simons, Ms. Brigitte Schrurs, and Ms. Madeleine Simons as administrators. Their mandates will last for 3 years from this date and will be served on a voluntary basis. The meeting concluded at 3:30 PM.
